PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-15472012-11-22,  ,  HC,  PMPRB,  , 
ActPatent Act
SubjectPatented Medicine Prices Review Board Rules of Practice and Procedure
PrecisPATENTED MEDICINES PRICES REVIEW BOARD RULES OF PRACTICE AND PROCEDURE in order to enhance: (1) the transparency of the Board's activities; (2) consistency in the exercise of its formal powers; (3) fairness to all parties appearing before the Board; and (4) the timely completion of hearings.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0247 Publication Date: 2012-12-05
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Patented Medicine Prices Review Board Rules of Practice and Procedure
